newsitem.title: USA: Dow rallies to unofficial 2nd largest point gain.
newsitem.headline: Dow rallies to unofficial 2nd largest point gain.

text.p: The Dow industrials soared to an unofficial 179-point gain on Tuesday, a rally that stands as the second largest point rise in the history of the blue chip average.
In percentage terms, however, the Dow's 2.65 percent rally came nowhere near the average's top performances.
The Dow's biggest gain in point terms remains a 186.84 point surge on October 21, 1987, two days after the so-called Black Monday market crash.
